Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires retailers to post warning signs of the tracking of customers through cell phones or other electronic devices
Summary: Requires retailers to post warning signs of the tracking of customers through cell phones or other electronic devices; provides for civil penalties.
LawCode: Add ยง390-f, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring retailers to post warning signs of the tracking of customers through cell phones, cameras, or other electronic devices that use software to track, monitor, and collect information on customers
